Author: suiyou16
Text: I downloaded the app, thanks for recommending it!

Author: bir_die
Text: I use the happy scale app and it averages out my weight for me. I find that kind of helps with water weight estimation. Otherwise I weigh myself first thing in the morning and once in the afternoon and figure the difference is likely waterweight. When I’m being real anal about my weight, I’ll take the weight exactly between the two and use that as my “real” weight of the day.
